page.title: 07Religions and Youth Clubs.
page.content: In Hartwell we have two kinds of church -a Methodist Chapel and a C.E.church. We also have a parish hall where we have a joint Sunday school for 4-7 yr olds.The 7-11 yr olds meet together in our parish hall.We have quite a lot of clubs in the village for younger people to join.Here is a list of the clubs: Boys'Brigade,Girls'Brigade,Brownies & Cubs,Girl Guides,Rangers and Scouts and a Youth Club which meets once a month. In Ashton there is the Parish Church & similar organisations exist there for young people.Both Ashton and Hartwell schools are used for activities by PTAs including discos for their pupils.There are plans to start a cricket team again after it and a football club folded by lack of support in Hartwell.Ashton's rugby and cricket club have youth teams which are strong. Rachel Husbands,11
